attributes.action: To start a national NHS day
attributes.additional_details: I think the national NHS day is the least we can do to say thankyou to the people who risked their lives to save others. Also to show how proud this country is of all of them.
attributes.background: After the covid19 hell has disappeared..I would like the government to hold a national NHS day annually,mirroring armed forces day to show just how the NHS is appreciated. A fun day for all areas it could also be used as a recruitment drive to bolster all emergency services across the board.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303882

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
